# <code>str-lengths</code> for dataframe

<div class='command-title'>Get lengths of all strings</div>

## Signature

```> str-lengths```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Returns string lengths
```shell
  > [a ab abc] | into df | str-lengths
```
